xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanenapahātabbattika » 9.1 Paṭiccavāra » 9.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 9.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Napurejāta
Dassanenapahātabbattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Napurejāta
20.
830Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe dassanena pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe… . (1)
831Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  dassanena pahātabbe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (2)
832Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo…pe…  arūpe bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. (1)
833Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo…pe…  bhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (2)
21.
834Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā, nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe… . (1)
835Dassanena pahātabbañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo…pe…  dassanena pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
836Bhāvanāya pahātabbañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  bhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
